publ: by VayuVaidya: Dr Bheemaiah, Anil Kumar
name: MyPomegranateTree
0:
”Alexa, open my pomegranate tree”
”Alexa, start my pomegranate tree”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my pomegranate tree
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. 
Go Vegan or atleast entomological. Can we palate insects and grubs, much like our Piscean and Avian friends? The answer is yes, we can eat, silkworm pupae, a whole range of caterpillars, grasshoppers and even maggots. As the world industrializes, meat will soon be a mixture of plant, synthetic and insect protien, this is sustainable and maybe the future of food. 
Listen to this story of a little boy who discovers that caterpillars are food and saves an old tree from a pest invasion.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
